Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the extent of pollution in Los Angeles during the time period mentioned.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide specific evidence or data to support the statement about people not being able to go outside due to pollution.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the pollution in the air was the sole reason for people not being able to go outside, without considering other factors such as weather conditions or personal health issues.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for why people may not have been able to go outside, such as safety concerns or other environmental factors.
